All Classes

Class Summary 
Class Description
Client
This class represents a client as an object that has an id, a name and an address.
ClientBLL
This class invokes the methods from the corresponding dao classes
ClientDAO
This class is the link to the database and implements static methods which execute queries on the corresponding tables from the database
Command
This class contains information about a command that is taken from the user, including the name of the command and the parameters needed for proper execution
ConnectionFactory
This class is a singleton class that connects the application to the database
Controller
This is the class that provides the adapted input to the application and created the needed resources for generating the output
Main
This is the main class of the application and it contains only the main method that is run
Order
This class represents an order that corresponds to a client
OrderBLL
This class invokes the methods from the corresponding dao classes
OrderDAO
This class is the link to the database and implements static methods which execute queries on the corresponding tables from the database
Orderitem
This class represents an order that is placed at a moment of time
OrderitemBLL
This class invokes the methods from the corresponding dao classes
OrderitemDAO
This class is the link to the database and implements static methods which execute queries on the corresponding tables from the database
Product
This class represents a product
ProductBLL
This class invokes the methods from the corresponding dao classes
ProductDAO
This class is the link to the database and implements static methods which execute queries on the corresponding tables from the database
View
This is the class that provides the interaction with the user, taking in the input and generating the corresponding output
